thread.title: BRIEF-National Cinemedia Q4 Loss Per Share $0.07

title: BRIEF-National Cinemedia Q4 Loss Per Share $0.07
text: March 12, 2018 / 8:19 PM / in 14 minutes BRIEF-National Cinemedia Q4 Loss Per Share $0.07 Reuters Staff March 12 (Reuters) - National Cinemedia Inc: * NATIONAL CINEMEDIA, INC. REPORTS RESULTS FOR FISCAL FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $425 MILLION TO $445 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE $140.7 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $144.5 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.21 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.27 EXCLUDING ITEMS * ‍FOR FY 2018, CO EXPECTS TOTAL REVENUE TO BE FLAT TO UP 4.5% AND ADJUSTED OIBDA TO BE DOWN 2.5% TO UP 4.8% FROM FY 2017​ * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $440.0 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
